About: I am a passionate and dedicated individual with a strong desire to make a positive impact on the world. I have a deep love for learning and I am always eager to expand my knowledge and skills. I am a natural problem solver and I thrive on challenging situations. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Computer Science at the University of Bristol. My goal is to contribute to the tech industry and make a positive impact on the world.

I am a unique and talented individual with a passion for software development .As a young software developer I'm fueled by innovation and a drive for making a difference through technology.With a solid foundation to programming fundamentals and a keen interest in emerging trends I'm constantly expanding my skills to stay ahead of the curve.I take pride in delivering high-quality projects that meet and exceed expectations. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and learn from them. I am eager to contribute to the tech community and make mark in software development.

education.paragraph: I completed my schooling at Mondale high in 2023. I matriculated with a certificate in computer literacy which include: Windows 10, Microsoft Word 2019, Microsoft Excel 2019, Microsoft PowerPoint 2019 and Google services.

A Bootcamp program that teachers you the essentials of web development. I am learning the principles of web development at the bootcamp, and I am also gaining important leadership skills in interpersonal skills training.

experience.title: Aspiring Web Developer
experience.paragraph: A Bootcamp program that teachers you the essentials of web development. I am learning the principles of web development at the bootcamp, and I am also gaining important leadership skills in interpersonal skills training.

experience.title: Volunteer
experience.paragraph: Volunteering at the dog shelter is deeply rewarding. It's a joy to spend time with the dogs, knowing I'm making a positive impact on their lives and being part of a caring community of volunteers.

skills.name: HTML
skills.summary: Proficient in structuring web pages with HTML, including forms, tables, and multimedia elements. Experienced in creating responsive layouts and integrating with CSS and JavaScript for dynamic content.

skills.name: CSS
skills.summary: Basic understanding of CSS for styling web pages, focusing on layout, colors, fonts, and responsive design. Has applied CSS to enhance user interfaces and improve visual appeal.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.summary: Skilled in JavaScript for creating interactive web experiences. Proficient in DOM manipulation, event handling, and asynchronous programming. Implemented functionality like calculators and data processing.

skills.name: Bootstrap
skills.summary: Familiar with Bootstrap framework for building responsive and mobile-first websites. Developed a portfolio site using Bootstrapâ€™s grid system, components, and utilities for effective front-end development.

skills.name: Figma
skills.summary: I showcase my intermediate-level proficiency in Figma for designing user interfaces and creating interactive prototypes. I demonstrate how Figma facilitates collaborative design processes and helps me create intuitive digital experiences that blend creativity with functionality.

skills.name: Github
skills.summary: I demonstrate my use of GitHub to showcase coding projects and collaborate on code with others. I highlight how GitHub repositories reflect my growth as an intermediate developer, showcasing my commitment to clean, well-documented code and effective version control practices.

testimonials.name: Keira Kistensamy
testimonials.paragraph: Chelsea Julie's ability to work effectively with others, combined with her kindness and warmth makes her a valuable asset on any team.She is a conscientious, hard working and goal directed.Show's initiative and enjoys seeing projects through to positive conclusions.

testimonials.name: Erin Williams
testimonials.paragraph: I've had the pleasure of working with Chelsea Julie, and I can confidently say she's an exceptional person.she brings a strong work ethic, dedication and commitment to everything she does.

testimonials.name: Awodwa Hendricks
testimonials.paragraph: Chelsea's passion and drive are evident in her approach to her work, and she's always willing to adapt.she is a dedicated worker and commited to completing her task.

testimonials.name: Daniel Umetor
testimonials.paragraph: It's been a pleasure to work alongside Chelsea and see her dedication to her work firsthand. I have no doubt she'll exeed in and role she'll take on.She worls well under pressure and finds pleasure in finding answers to abrasive situations.

testimonials.name: Valhatiem Raynard
testimonials.paragraph: I really admired Chelsea for the active role she took in her studies. She never lost sight of it. She was very punctual and showed up to every one of my classes on time. Chelsea is a very hard worker and produces excellent results while in my class.She will be able to work well in any organisation.
